website_summaries.verdict: Cover is well-made, looks shiny, and provides plenty of clearance for steaming dishes. Like a wok cover your grandmother had in the 70s.
pros: Stainless steel construction, Black plastic handle top
Has a convenient hook on one side for hanging the lid
Appears well-made and should last for several years if properly cared for
The lid is designed in a way that it does not have to fit tightly to prevent steam from escaping
Works beautifully on cast iron woks used on camp stoves
cons: Steam seems to lift it at times
could have added steam holes for better use
The screws for the handle are super soft metal – so soft that using a screwdriver without that much force may completely shred the head

customer_reviews.title: Too flimsy.  Replacing it
customer_reviews.text: This just doesn't work for most uses. It is too light to form a decent seal on the wok. Just sort've slides around. Also its slightly bend out of shape so sealing is even less effective. And it is really too light to even handle easily. It sort've flops around and you need to be really careful grabbing it. I threw out an older, beat up, but heavier gauge lid that I would pay good money to have back. THis has been a lousy replacement so I am now shopping for a new one. Sigh...
customer_reviews.author: WSK

customer_reviews.title: In the beginning I thought The lid itself was fine but did not fit my 14" wok because of ...
customer_reviews.text: In the beginning I thought The lid itself was fine but did not fit my 14" wok because of the lip on the lid which I considered a design flaw. I was wrong. The way the lid is designed, it apparently does not have to fit tightly to prevent steam from escaping. Works beautifully! Some reviews indicated they were so thin they bent easily and seemed cheap. Mine is not so thin that I would worry about dents at all. It is actually a nice looking and very functional lid.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this about 7mths ago and the handle broke in two. Both pieces are still attached by the screws but they swivel around since it's not connected. The domed lid was way too high anyway and it never fit flush on top of my 14in wok. I always hand washed it and it still broke. Also the thin metal material gets super hot and many times I burnt my fingers trying to hold the handle and my knuckles would touch the hot lid metal.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Steel Wok Cover That Fits Perfectly In Our Lodge 14" Wok (see pictures)
customer_reviews.text: This item was purchased for a 14" Lodge Cast Iron Wok. We could not be more delighted with the product. It is light, well made, looks particularly attractive, and has a great handle that fits perfectly in our Wok. There were no dents or imperfections. And what a great price! This item is a home run. We want to thank other reviewers for recommending this Steel Wok Cover.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight material
customer_reviews.text: It's super light. I was expecting a little more weight to it. It's just as like as a 12 oz. beverage can. I did not like the fact there was a WINCO sticker on the top of the lid. The sticker was not easy to remove and now I got to concentrate on removing the remaining adhesion off the lid; instead of washing and using it.
customer_reviews.author: JE

customer_reviews.title: what's not to love?
customer_reviews.text: This cover does fit the "16 inch Traditional Cast Iron Wok" by Wok Shop much better than the. The latter lid does not fit correctly - it is too small. The Winco cover comes unassembled, and the handle is secured by two screws. The handle does not heat up appreciably (I haven't noticed it), and this cover is much easier to manipulate than the lid that has only one screw in the center. If you are wondering about the clip-like object in the photo, apparently it is a hanger loop for storing the cover on a hook on the wall. The clip is spot-welded to the cover and has not presented a problem. enjoy...
customer_reviews.author: jomyer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made wok lid
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a Lodge P14W3 Seasoned Cast Iron Wok, 14 inch. The fit is fine, but the lid itself is some super thin aluminum and the screws holding the handle to the lid are the worst cheap screws that money can buy. I already lost one, but luckily I found a good enough replacement in my collection of random screws. For the quality of worksmanship and the cost of materials, charging more than $5 for it seems like a ripoff.
customer_reviews.author: H. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Large and light
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect size for the Bayou Classic cowboy wok. It has a nice high dome for those that want to add a rack to the wok for baking purposes. Others have said it is thin and therefore not good, I disagree, it is nice and light for handling and you can hang it from the side of the unit or table.
customer_reviews.author: Brock S.

customer_reviews.title: Very cheap!
customer_reviews.text: This was a total disappointed, you forget how a poor quality an item can be until you get one. It is very fragile, if you drop it it will be damaged. Not matching with my grill at all. A waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously useful
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use on our Blackstone flat-top grill, but in all honesty it gets used MUCH more than that. I have a large frying pan that came with no lid and I was using a smaller lid, it was so lame. This works with pretty much every pan I have and also on the flat-top. It is excellent that it has a hanging loop, so I can hang it right on my pot rack. Oh yeah...just remembered my cast iron wok doesn't have a lid. So now I can use this too. Yay.
customer_reviews.author: Angela_GTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and light. I use it with the big 14" Cuisinart pan and it is a tad small for it the 15" might have worked better but I am happy with it aside from how it fits my pasta pan. It also fits a standard carbon steel wok very nicely if you want to steam vegetables in wok.
customer_reviews.author: crunchytunes

customer_reviews.title: Works fine if you're not Conan
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. Keeps the moisture in while you're stir-frying. It's light and thin. If you're Conan the Barbarian, this cover is not for you. It's SO light, I can rest it on thiswhile I'm stirring the veggies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: This lid is fairly light, and appears to be made ok for the price. When it arrived, the handle could not be assembled and amazon was not at all helpful. Overall, go for a higher quality piece.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Very nice lid for the price
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a dent that I was able to easily push out. I appreciate that it's very light weight. Fits my 14" Lodge wok beautifully. It's likely to scratch pretty easily, so I'll just have to be a bit careful with it. Will likely fit over a pizza to keep it warm, also. The hanging loop is securely attached, so will be able to hang the lid from a hook.
customer_reviews.author: bunnysaver

customer_reviews.title: Now I can steam fish!
customer_reviews.text: I've been eyeing a wok cover for so many months, and now I can steam things with my wok. Up until now, I've had to use my skillet pan which was "fine", but this wok cover levels me up to new possibilities! Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect specs!!
customer_reviews.text: The wok cover is not 17 3/4 inches as advertised. Outside edge to edge it is 17 3/8 inches. If you use it on a wok it would still rest inside the wok and remain effective. I want to use it as a cover for a 17 inch paella pan. It almost didn't fit. The specs need to be changed to better reflect the actual dimensions.
customer_reviews.author: DctR

customer_reviews.title: SIgh
customer_reviews.text: I was one of the many people to not receive a handle. Cover is great besides missing 50% of the order. Quality control issues on ensuring two items are together is really frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Extremely light weight, very sturdy around the sides and circumference... but thinner around the flat (handle) area. This could dent easily, and I will have to handle this carefully. Neat little hook clasp for storage. Fits my 14 inch wok perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light weight cover lid
customer_reviews.text: Price is right. The lid is light and serves the purpose. I bought Lodge P14W3 Pro-Logic Cast Iron Wok, 14-inch, Black , and this lid fit perfectly. My wok is heavy, and I don’t need lid to be heavy as my wok too. If the lid is heavy, then I would remind myself to be careful not to chip off my counter top. I would lay it down gentle every time I uncover my wok. For this light weight cover lid, I am worry free, and also it’s inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Siev

customer_reviews.title: Winco WKCS-15 Stainless Steel Wok Cover, 15-3/8-Inch
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 15-3/8" stainless steel wok cover and was shocked how paper thin the stainless steel lid is under the handle area. I have a different company's lid cover that is lightweight but not nearly as thin as this one. It's so thin that almost anything that touches it will damage the lid. Very disappointed in the quality of this wok lid. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: ducaticraig

customer_reviews.title: Light but fragile
customer_reviews.text: Liked the handle and size for wok. The lip of the cover are not rolled so the edges are easily bent and damaged causing seal to wok to be compromised.
customer_reviews.author: pedal2go

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a cover with no glass and gasket to grow mold on
customer_reviews.text: handle & fastening is cheesy, but it's served its purpose so far. Revised review: had it for a while now. So much better than glass with stainless salmonella rings. I love it & so does the wife. Tossing around the big woks is hard for her, so having a featherweight lid is highly desirable and appreciated. I highly suggest this for you wok users or for any 14" pan.
customer_reviews.author: esteban

customer_reviews.title: Does it’s job
customer_reviews.text: Does the job in covering large pans, somewhat thin, could have been a little heavier steam seems to lift it at times could have added steam holes but for the price I’m pleased
customer_reviews.author: Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits the Lodge cast iron wok,sits inside the wok as most do. Seams to work well enough
customer_reviews.author: G. Rath

customer_reviews.title: Looks cheap
customer_reviews.text: Looks cheap. We purchased this for our large wok, Which did not have a lid. It fits fine but looks cheap and feels very cheap. However it serves it’s purpose. Otherwise I would’ve returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Bookworm

customer_reviews.title: Missing handle
customer_reviews.text: Product is very flimsy and metal is very thin, but you really can't expect much quality at such a low price. It serves it's purpose. I did however expect it to come with the handle shown on the picture. Now am I really gonna cause a stink about this? No I just made my own handle. It will do what I need it to do as a cover for my wok and also a dome to cook on my large outdoor griddle.
customer_reviews.author: TW Slack

customer_reviews.title: A good deal... just make sure you have a 15-in or larger wok...
customer_reviews.text: This is a well-built wok lid... sturdy and made of stainless steel. It just sits on top of the lip of my 14in wok... but I guess I will just get a larger wok since my one is already scratched. You could also use this to cover a plate on the counter to hold in a bit of heat in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: OhioAwesome

customer_reviews.title: Great on a small griddle
customer_reviews.text: Used on my Blackstone to heat bacon wrapped asparagus. Yummy.
customer_reviews.author: John J

customer_reviews.title: nice wok cover
customer_reviews.text: Item as advertised. A little on thin side when it comes to the steel used in construction but does what it supposed to do
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the heat in my Wok.
customer_reviews.text: This cover is not a heavy cover. Treat it with respect and you wont have a problem with bumps. It works with the Lodge Wok just fine. Easy to rinse and dry. Does the job I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm D. Leonard Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Much better than that old pizza pan I was using for a lid.
customer_reviews.text: Wok Cover arrived in one piece, no dents. It is very lightweight, but nicely designed with a hanging ring, good handle, some circular decorative accents on the stainless steel top. Handle with care and hope for long and useful service. Price is reasonable, shipping was fast.
customer_reviews.author: dellyjoe

customer_reviews.title: This is my secret weapon on the griddle
customer_reviews.text: I have made some awesome meals using this. Everyone wonders how I get the cheese melted perfectly or that extra crisp on the meat. It's my secret weapon and I love having it.
customer_reviews.author: DeanS

customer_reviews.title: Stainless Steel is Very Thin
customer_reviews.text: I can only give this product a 3 star because the steel is very thin, no suitable for rough handling. The product description says stainless steel but I have never seen stainless steel this flimsy. The cover can be easily dented and the edges are not uniform, which does not provide a perfect seal all around my wok.
customer_reviews.author: BKGM

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate Size
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT 14 inches. The label on this item clearly says 13.5 inches and it also measures 13.5 inches. Half an inch makes a difference if you are trying to make sure it covers the entire pan/pot to cook! Disappointing!!
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Returned it, didn’t approve of any reaction with food
customer_reviews.text: K looks stainless steel. But on single use while cooking the steam that settles on inside log the lid gives out an iron residue.
customer_reviews.author: APPS

customer_reviews.title: Great Discada cover
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with my Discada. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Just because the lid is sold to accommodate a certain pan, do what you can to assure that it is the right one  for the job.
customer_reviews.text: It is light and seems to be well made. The handle is large enough to be used easily without burning your fingers. Worth the money just make sure of the sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Marvin

customer_reviews.title: It's a wok lid. Plain and simple.
customer_reviews.text: What can you say? It does the job and the price was right. The shipping got it here in fairly short order. If you buy a wok from, say, Walmart, it will not likely have a lid that goes with it. This is a cheap stopgap measure to prevent buying a wok that is three or four times more expensive (but does have a lid). Verdict: Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Leib Gershon Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: what i was looking for
customer_reviews.text: i have a 15inch wok and this cover fit it nicely
customer_reviews.author: albert  e.  cote

customer_reviews.title: S/S Wok Cover 13-3/4"
customer_reviews.text: wok cover is the right size for 14" wok and is quite sturdy. it works great on my 14" wok and because it is a different shape than the typical dome type it is easier to store.
customer_reviews.author: MBW

customer_reviews.title: Keeps right temperature & easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: Excellent not only for the wok but to cover warm food. It does it's purpose of keeping the right temperature and great stir fry recipes results. I like the plastic handler, it prevent getting hot and makes easy for cleaning. As for the type of material, stainless steel is the way to go!
customer_reviews.author: Margarita R Dismukes

customer_reviews.title: missing a screw
customer_reviews.text: Missing a screw for the handle, good lid besides that
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Ericsson

customer_reviews.title: flimsy but works well
customer_reviews.text: Feels flimsy and metal is fragile and soft but does the job well for a good price. have caution fastening handle on as any force used can warp the metal. hard to believe this is stainless steel but it does what i need it to so that is okay
customer_reviews.author: Dominic

customer_reviews.title: Huge Dent
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a huge dent in it! The box from Amazon was clearly too shallow but they chose to force it in there anyways and now we must return it.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler R.

customer_reviews.title: That Amazon will respond to this request.
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived with no handle. Quality control of products needs to be greatly improved. Send me a handle and screws so that I can complete the assembly.
customer_reviews.author: DavidSGoldman

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Not a good quality stainless steel. Easily dented with finger pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Shanthakumar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement for magma grill lid
customer_reviews.text: I lost the lid to my magma grill on my boat. Exact replacement would have been $50-$75 for just a lid! This wok lid saved the day for a fraction of the price. I did drill a few 1/4" holes in the top for venting.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 14 in wok perfectly !!! Is nice and lightweighted to lift easily and the handle is nice and sturdy . Also has a nice little hook to pick it up slightly when need to peak inside the wok which I just love .
customer_reviews.author: sunshine21

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Very durable. Already dropped it a couple of times while camping but still in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and hope it fits the wok I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Judio

customer_reviews.title: The dome shape makes it easy to steam food.
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be holding its shape. Easy to use and to clean.
customer_reviews.author: rosebows

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the covers. The handle does not get hot like another cover that I had bought elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy R.

customer_reviews.title: it will not fit to 14 inch wok.
customer_reviews.text: it will not fit to 14 inch wok. it always angled and too small for 14 inch.
customer_reviews.author: MONTH OF JUNE

customer_reviews.title: Great cover/dome for my flat top grill.
customer_reviews.text: This is a LARGE cover, I actually bought it to cover pizzas and other foods on my flat top grill. The foods had a tendency to get overcooked on bottom but the top was not fully cooked. This cover has helped trap the heat and to cook more evenly. Great for my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Corbin

customer_reviews.title: Ok::
customer_reviews.text: It’s a small solid metal thin cover. It’s appropriate and it does it’s job but I was expecting a little bit more thicker metal. It is hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry S. Mefford

customer_reviews.title: Winco Wok Cover
customer_reviews.text: This works perfect with my Blackstone griddle. It's very lightweight but sturdy. I do remember the handle being a bit hot, once, otherwise, it's been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Super light weight
customer_reviews.text: Super light weight and fits my wok. I hope the handle holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Nincat

customer_reviews.title: No14 inches and ugly
customer_reviews.text: 14 inch is shown on the amazon but the product is just 13.75 inch. It can't even cover my wok. It is just like a stainless pot with a small handle. I think what he shows is definitely fake.
customer_reviews.author: zzzmq

customer_reviews.title: Missing handle, but otherwise good
customer_reviews.text: WORKS GREAT, but didn’t come with the handle. Very disappointing. Would have been 5 stars otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole S

customer_reviews.title: broken
customer_reviews.text: I have only had this a year and the handle already broke. I am very disappointed and would like a replacement
customer_reviews.author: Ellen H. Eisinberg

customer_reviews.title: Missing Plastic Handle
customer_reviews.text: Received lid without the plastic handle. Its only one item and they forget to include the handle. Lid is light weight and metal is very thin.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Grace

customer_reviews.title: Steamer cover
customer_reviews.text: Nice big cover for steaming veggies on the Blackstone Griddle.
customer_reviews.author: rick hildebrand

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected
customer_reviews.text: The product was exactly as described and did what it was purchased for.
customer_reviews.author: rochelle

customer_reviews.title: Very large!
customer_reviews.text: This was too big for what I needed. It is huge! But I will keep it for other uses. Very nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: n2dep2care

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made. Had to attach handle. One hole for bolt was defective with metal sticking up around the opening. Did not set well in my wok.
customer_reviews.author: M. A. Hardin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a mixing bowl with a handle haha, but it does its job.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Good, solid, very lightweight
customer_reviews.text: It's a pot lid, It covers the wok. It's lightweight, but does the job. Not much more to say about it, other than I like it.
customer_reviews.author: It's That Guy Phil

customer_reviews.title: After years of similar reviews 1) I should have known better than to order it and 2) they should be ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived without handle. Really? After years of similar reviews 1) I should have known better than to order it and 2) they should be getting it right.
customer_reviews.author: mountainmama

customer_reviews.title: Poor work cover
customer_reviews.text: It looks good, but I was disappointed after using it , the material too light.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: It works great. Use it as a steam lid on my ...
customer_reviews.text: Came in on time no damage to paging or to lid. It works great. Use it as a steam lid on my Blackstone griddle and also a great lid for my Disco (22" Outdoor wok)... nice handle that was easy as pie to install... great product for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard T.

customer_reviews.title: Great for a discada
customer_reviews.text: I use this for a discada (texas cooker disk) cover it works and looks great for that..
customer_reviews.author: Nash

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. So happy to have this lid to expand my use of the wok.
customer_reviews.author: Ami

customer_reviews.title: Works like a champ.
customer_reviews.text: I use this sucker on my Wok and on my Blackstone griddle to keep the heat in. You have to attach the handle yourself, but it is a quick task.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Brink

customer_reviews.title: I haven't had the need to use it yet but don't foresee any problems as it fits like it should
customer_reviews.text: It fits my 14 inch wok very well. I haven't had the need to use it yet but don't foresee any problems as it fits like it should.
customer_reviews.author: XiXi

customer_reviews.title: Boils water !...
customer_reviews.text: Works great on a cast iron wok (not the kind o' wock one fwows at wabbits, unnerstan' ?) makes boiling water possible whereas without it, it wasna...
customer_reviews.author: Motley

customer_reviews.title: Quality not verify before shipping
customer_reviews.text: It is a good size for my wok. It is light weight but not a perfect fit which is acceptable as it allow some steam to escape without rattling. However, a screw was missing from the handle. It was a difficult screw size to find at the local hardware store.
customer_reviews.author: SeaBeeReverie

customer_reviews.title: It fits perfect and works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Lodge cast iron wok. It fits perfect and works great. It is lightweight, and scratches easily. I scratched it up trying to remove the sticker they put on it. So, if you want something that is going to keep it's looks I would look for something else. If you need something to cook with and is going to clean up easily look no further. I have had several carbon steel lids in the past, and they always end up getting rust on them.i would rather have scratches than rust.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: No handle in the package...
customer_reviews.text: Well I was warned, but I went and bought the 15 inch lid anyways... And here I am, sans handle on my lid. No screws or handle or nothing. Great job, QA department.
customer_reviews.author: Sotto

customer_reviews.title: NO HANDLE
customer_reviews.text: The wok cover looks good, however, the handle is missing. I don't understand how come this can happen. Gonna return it.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Wong

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it... actuality size is bigger than I thought.. great buy.. highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Raj

customer_reviews.title: but hard to complain at such a good price. It is fine for what I paid
customer_reviews.text: very lightweight material--arrived with small dent in rim, but hard to complain at such a good price. It is fine for what I paid.
customer_reviews.author: John Adams-Graf

customer_reviews.title: Great lid!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our Wok and for our other pans. Easy to clean and handle is very sturdy. I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: jan tetzlaff

customer_reviews.title: Great Lid
customer_reviews.text: Does the job I bought it for perfectly and at a reasonable price. It is lower quality but priced accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Ed K.

customer_reviews.title: 14 inch is smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a 14 inch, but it actually is 13-3/4-Inch, not quite fit with my 14" Wok
customer_reviews.author: vincent

customer_reviews.title: Great grill addition
customer_reviews.text: Works well for what it is designed, speeds up cooking.
customer_reviews.author: jerry walker

customer_reviews.title: Not reco
customer_reviews.text: I dislike the fact it DID NOT come with a handle. I guess I have to make one for it
customer_reviews.author: Ferlen Putman

customer_reviews.title: No handle included
customer_reviews.text: The lid did not come with a handle, which makes it useless. If I could find out who to contact to get a handle I would leave a better review.
customer_reviews.author: Bones

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Steel is a little on the thin side but still great nonetheless since this is just a cover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only one (1) screw for the handle.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cover. Only one (1) screw for the handle. Crazy to not have quality control and include the simple correct amount of screws.
customer_reviews.author: Fairway

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't have a handle on the top. How am I supposed to use it?
customer_reviews.author: Michael Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Dome
customer_reviews.text: It came with out the handle. I need the handle
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: I love it! cooks everything under it faster
customer_reviews.text: I love it ! cooks everything under it faster, no splattering on the Blackstone cooktop !
customer_reviews.author: Robert V. Feasel jr.

customer_reviews.title: Nice wok lid!
customer_reviews.text: This lid is lightweight, but considering the size, it would be too heavy to use if it was much thicker. Recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: MO Resident

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and provide roomy space for steaming, very light to handle, easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: M. Yin

customer_reviews.title: perfect as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my wok, light, easy to clean, and value priced
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Cheon

customer_reviews.title: Replacement screws.
customer_reviews.text: Got my cover today and while putting the handle on, I dropped one of the screws and cannot find. I was wondering where I can get a replacement and what size is it? No problems so far, need to get a wall mount so I can hang it up next to my wok.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis M Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Use as dome over foods on grill. Keeps food warm & Moist.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: It is a Wok cover, there is not much to say. It does what it is suppose to do with a wok.
customer_reviews.author: G. Veras

customer_reviews.title: I like the lid
customer_reviews.text: It came without a handle! Now I either have to spend an hour making one myself or return it. Otherwise, I like the lid. It's light weight.

customer_reviews.text: Works great. Just have to be careful because the cover can dent easily.
